ARABIC: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No one denies it except for every evil aggressor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: None denies it but the sinful transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Yet none gives the lie to it except the transgressor immersed in sin;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: No one rejects it except the sinful transgressors
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And none will deny it, except every transgressor, rebel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And none can deny it except every transgressor beyond bounds, the sinner!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And none gives the lie to it but every exceeder of limits, sinful one
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and none cries lies to it but every guilty aggressor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Which none denieth save each criminal transgressor,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: No one denies it except for the evil aggressor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And none belieth it save each trespasser, sinner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and none denies it except every sinful transgressor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And none can deny it but the Transgressor beyond bounds the Sinner!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And none can deny it except every transgressor beyond bounds, (in disbelief, oppression and disobedience of Allah, the sinner!)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: None belies it except every guilty sinner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But none denies it except the sinful aggressor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:12] and none deny it but every sinful (the form [athīm] is hyperbolic) transgressor, overstepping the bounds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Which none denieth) i.e. none denies the Day of Judgement (save each criminal transgressor) save each sinful and unjust person who transgresses against the Truth, such as al-Walid Ibn al-Mughirah al-Makhzumi,
